primevc.core.dispatcher.INotifier

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
IUnbindable<FunctionSignature>
An INotifier calls message handlers of type that are registered using bind(). INotifier is Observable aswell.

Instance Methods

bind(owner : Dynamic, handler : FunctionSignature) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

bindDisabled(owner : Dynamic, handler : FunctionSignature) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

bindOnce(owner : Dynamic, handler : FunctionSignature) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

observe(owner : Dynamic, handler : Void -> Void) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

observeDisabled(owner : Dynamic, handler : Void -> Void) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

observeOnce(owner : Dynamic, handler : Void -> Void) : Wire<FunctionSignature>
